name: IMDb Nostalghia theme
description:
Features
	- left hand navigation brought back (in old school colors)
	- width unfixed to 100% of your screen resolution (the style requires at least about 1100px horizontal resolution)
	- both newly redesigned pages (main details, actor) and not yet redesigned pages are restyled
	- changed colors of fonts, links, table rows and boxes in a hope to make imdb more readable and pleasant
	- hidden contents of boxes with top billed cast, photos, videos, recommendations and faq in order to streamline the page a bit

Tested in Firefox and Opera.
